Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local CAS = game:GetService("ContextActionService") local ActionName = "PenguinAttack"
local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
function onAction(actionName, inputState, inputObject) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer("Activate", Mouse.Hit.p) end end
function onEquipped() --ensure unequip onUnequipped()
--bind CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( ActionName, onAction, false, Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1, Enum.UserInputType.Touch ) end
function onUnequipped() --unbind CAS:UnbindAction(ActionName) end
function playAnimation(name, ...) local anim = Tool:FindFirstChild(name) if anim then local human = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if human then local track = human:LoadAnimation(anim) track:Play(...) end end end
function onRemote(func, ...) if func == "PlayAnimation" then playAnimation(...) end end
--connect Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnClientEvent:connect(onRemote)

local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote") local PenguinAi = Tool:WaitForChild("PenguinAi") local TargetPosition = Tool:WaitForChild("TargetPosition")
local PenguinDamage = 15 local PenguinTime = 15
local PenguinsNumber = 5 local PenguinsMax = 8 local PenguinsReloadTime = 2
function onEquipped() onUnequipped() end
function onUnequipped()
end
function getPlayer() return game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) end
function createPenguin(position) local penguin = Handle:Clone() penguin.Name = "Penguin" penguin.CFrame = CFrame.new(position) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi * 2 * math.random(), 0) + Vector3.new(0, penguin.Size.Y/2, 0) penguin.CanCollide = true
local toolPointer = Instance.new("ObjectValue") toolPointer.Name = "ToolPointer" toolPointer.Value = Tool toolPointer.Parent = penguin
local damage = Instance.new("NumberValue") damage.Name = "Damage" damage.Value = PenguinDamage damage.Parent = penguin
local player = Instance.new("ObjectValue") player.Name = "Player" player.Value = getPlayer() player.Parent = penguin
local ai = PenguinAi:Clone() ai.Disabled = false ai.Parent = penguin
penguin.Parent = workspace
game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(penguin, PenguinTime) end
function onActivate(position) TargetPosition.Value = position
if PenguinsNumber > 0 then createPenguin(Handle.Position)
PenguinsNumber = PenguinsNumber - 1 penguinsNumberUpdated() end end
function onRemote(player, func, ...) if player ~= getPlayer() then return end
if func == "Activate" then onActivate(...) end end
function penguinsNumberUpdated() if PenguinsNumber <= 0 then Handle.Transparency = 1 else Handle.Transparency = 0 end end
function reloadPenguin() PenguinsNumber = math.min(PenguinsNumber + 1, PenguinsMax) penguinsNumberUpdated() delay(PenguinsReloadTime, reloadPenguin) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnServerEvent:connect(onRemote) reloadPenguin()

local Penguin = script.Parent local Tool = Penguin:WaitForChild("ToolPointer").Value local Damage = Penguin:WaitForChild("Damage").Value local Player = Penguin:WaitForChild("Player").Value
local DamageAble = true local DamageReload = 1
--stabilize local Gyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") Gyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) Gyro.cframe = Penguin.CFrame Gyro.Parent = Penguin
local Move = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") Move.maxForce = Vector3.new(5e3, 0, 5e3) Move.velocity = Vector3.new() Move.Parent = Penguin
--some timers local MoveTime = 0.9 local MoveTimer = 0
function jumpTime() return 0.75 + math.random() * 1.25 end
local JumpTimer = jumpTime()
function getRandomTargetPosition() local targetPosition = Tool.TargetPosition if targetPosition then return targetPosition.Value + Vector3.new(math.random(-8, 8), 0, math.random(-8, 8)) end end
function moveTo(position) local delta = position - Penguin.Position local distance = delta.magnitude local speed = 14 local t = math.min(distance / speed, MoveTime - 0.1)
Move.velocity = delta.unit * speed delay(t, function() Move.velocity = Vector3.new() end)
local a = Penguin.Position local b = Vector3.new(position.X, a.Y, position.Z) Gyro.cframe = CFrame.new(a, b) end
function jump() Penguin.Velocity = Penguin.Velocity + Vector3.new(0, 50, 0) end
function tagHuman(human) local val = Instance.new("ObjectValue") val.Name = "creator" val.Value = Player val.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(val, 1) end
function onTouched(part) if not DamageAble then return end if part.Parent == Player.Character then return end
if part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHuman(human) human:TakeDamage(Damage)
DamageAble = false delay(DamageReload, function() DamageAble = true end) end end
--begin ai game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:connect(function(dt) MoveTimer = MoveTimer - dt if MoveTimer <= 0 then moveTo(getRandomTargetPosition()) MoveTimer = MoveTime end
JumpTimer = JumpTimer - dt if JumpTimer <= 0 then jump() JumpTimer = jumpTime() end end)
Penguin.Touched:connect(onTouched)
